sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card
        class="px-3"
        flat
        tile
        outlined>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="phase.name"
                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                    class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                    label="Name"
                    outlined
                    type="text"
                    required>
                </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="phase.description"
                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                    class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                    label="Description"
                    outlined
                    type="text"
                    required>
                </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="phase.start_date"
                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                    class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                    label="Start Date"
                    outlined
                    type="text"
                    required>
                </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="phase.end_date"
                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                    class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                    label="End Date"
                    outlined
                    type="text"
                    required>
                </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-card>


</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PhaseCard',
    props: {
        phase: Object,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            phase_name: '',
            rules: {
                required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        submitForm() {
            console.log(this.phase)
        }
    },
}
</script>
